name: Sugar Woods
description:
Sugar Woods is a platformer-puzzle game about eating and getting fat. You play as Okui, a monster who loves eating candy and he is looking for new flavours. Okui discovers that there is a group of islands called Sugar Woods where everything is made of candy, villagers too. So he decides to sail to the islands and… well, eat all the candy villagers.

As Okui you have to find the weighing machine of every zone to know the weight needed in order to get the access to the next one. Find and chase the villagers to eat them but be careful, some physical activities might make you lose weight. So you have to decide if it’s worth it climbing a hill to check if there is someone you can eat, running after that small candy or investing time solving a puzzle.

OUR DELICIOUS TEAM

  • Programmer: Julen Hodgson
  • Lead artist: Lorena López
  • 3D artist: Iñigo Garriga
  • Music: Pablo Espada

Stay sweet and tuned on TWITTER and INSTAGRAM!
